content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work,and while on the main road to my house; i saw an oval shaped object hovering in the sky. while at the traffic light i witnessed the object start moving and it than changed direction abruptly. this isn't the first time i've seen a ufo and being a united states marine vet, i know what capabilities of aircraft are. it was to big to be a balloon and maneuvered unlike anything i've seen in the past being in the military. by the time i was able to get my camcorder out from my smartphone the object disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving home and saw the object hovering in the sky. it than changed direction abruptly.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside viewing the stars on a clear night with another person at 11pm. admiring the clarity, we were learning some constellations in the yard, 5' from the porch, 30' from the tree line. we noticed a flash of light and thought it was lightning. we looked in the direction that it came from. there was a small white light in the sky traveling very steadily from n to se about 2.5 miles up in the sky. the other person's husband is a pilot, and they travel in personal planes very regularly, so she can calculate distances well. at first we thought it was a plane, but there weren't the signature red or white strobe lights on it. there was no sound, during or after we saw the object. we than saw it flash a very high powered white light beam down to earth-it almost looked like the led colored lights-so bright of a white with a hint of blue. it lit up the trees near the opening around us, and lasted a half a second. the traveling light in the sky than changed direction, now going e. we watched it as it beamed two more times, and than vanished. the other person and i were talking to each other the entire time, asking each other, "did you see that?!" and moving to see more clearly. after it was gone we went inside and talked about it. we were a little bit concerned and very curious but not necessarily scared. the entire event lasted about half a minute.
content.summary: Clear night sky. steady light traveling straight path in sky ~2.5miles up, beamed high powered light down once, changed direction but kept moving, beamed light down twice, vanished.

content.detailedDescription: A friend sent me these photos. taken in arizona while driving on the freeway. did not see object in question until later when looking at the photos at home. was initially taking picture of the storm clouds. this is all i know. i am sharing because i believe these photos to be real.
content.summary: Friend took photo of storm while driving home. realized after the fact what he had captured more than a storm in his photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was with another 3 persons at the balkony.2 to 3 minutes after midnight we saw a half-moon like object with pure red color(not glowing)it began to fade of.When it finished, 2 bright orbits appeard and begun to descend straight to the sea.When they reached the surface they started moving.We immediately(being happy) took the car and drove to the port as soon as possible)2 minutes later,when we arrived the object had changed their shape and they were like horizontial fluorescent tubes emiting the brightest golden light we ever saw.They were stady at the same spot while the "worm"-like shape was doing a "wave" movement.We moved back to the car and start driving,trying to reach the coastline to get closer.While driving,red object at the sky (it was over the clouds)was seen once again.We arrived at the closest beach while observing a "headlight" which look like scanning the area(moving the light towards the coast)we were amazed when we saw the surface of the sea.There were hundreds of lights red,white,blue (like airplanes) floating over the sea.The two brighting objects were not seen.There was one and bigger one(double size) moving to the coastline (north naybe)while blinking.You could see it emmiting enormous light and then turning of.Again and again,it was turning of and then again lighting up.We lost its sight while we drove again to reach it.One,can not suppose that they were the same type of objects.They could change their form and size,like controlling their energy.No solid objects,no sounds.The site is archaeological.No wind.The first "hot" day of summer.
content.summary: Red very big object dissapeared and 2 "flameballs" start descending.Hovering over the water,they changed to horizontial tube-like entitiew which emit enormous light

content.detailedDescription: I have been looking after a friends dogs for a few weeks in a private gated, very quiet estate. one evening the dogs started going absolutely nuts, barking and generally being upset by something outside. at around eleven i take them for a quick walk and final pee break before settling down. it was time to do this so i prepared their leashes which is normally a signal for them to get very excited. not this night. i practically had to drag them out and they were very pensive and still. staring into the night sky. i stared to head back in and noticed what i thought was an unusually bright, never seen before constellation. it had been a totally cloudless day and the night sky wasn't really dark enough to see stars. i realised i was observing a planet. later identified as jupiter, and three similar sized star like stars moving in a triangle formation. really high up and far apart. the triangle was leading with the front two lights and the third "point" behind, which struck me as odd because (pardon the pun) it flew in the face of conventional aerodynamics. the front two lights reached a certain point in the sky and began to become transparent and eventually disappear totally, leaving the third "point" light playing catch up. when it arrived at the same point, it too became transparent and disappeared. i knew deep down that the object was still there flying through the night sky. i could almost sense it. i've waited all my life for a genuine ufo encounter and the strangest thing was, if felt so normal and mundane. that being said upon closing the front door to the house, i double locked it just in case. not that that would make any difference at all.
content.summary: Large triangle of lights. in the direction of jupiter. very high up. appeared to cloak once observed starting with leading two lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched a ufo due west of cobourg, ontario, over lake ontario. the brightest star in the sky moved west, sort of following an airliner travelling north east, then it bounced immediately south like a ball off of a wall, then up, down, and in a j pattern to the right. then it moved left and faded to black. then over several minutes it pulsated very slowly and irregularly from bright to black, while oscillating up and down. far too high and distant to be a drone. no aircraft sound, and while fading it would sometimes turn a light reddish hue. then it disappeared. a helicopter could move sort of like this but it isn't a helicopter. the oscillations were too rapid.  i'm a student pilot and very experienced plane spotter.  it did things an aircraft cannot do.  

this ufo came back last night (1:15 am may 30). same spot; due west. it drove silently north east, stopped immediately, then went south, stopped, pulsed in and out from bright white to black, then went behind a cloud. a little higher than 45 degrees, well above the trees, but it has the appearance of the brightest star in the sky. both sightings were also witnessed by my wife.  i tried video taping it but the light was too feint for the camera to pick up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brightest star in the sky, changed direction instantly, not an aircraft. witnessed over 2 nights (may 29-30)

content.detailedDescription: I was recently in quintana roo mexico and on 5/18/7 observed what appeared to be a metal object 3 to 5 miles off the coast moving in an erratic manner and not like any known aircraft i'd seen.  a vivid reflection is what made me notice the tiny object. i watched the object for roughly 60 to 90 seconds before filming the attached video. i immediately knew it was odd and called to my wife to come and look. before i could turn the recorder back on it moved upwards and disappeared. i'm usually not out looking for videos to post but wanted others to see what i'd seen and judge for themselves.
content.summary: Reflective orb miles away moves fast and erratic

content.detailedDescription: Driving home,saw lights,then upon looking to my left,saw a rounded craft,hovering,then slowly moving to left,then it disappears within 30 seconds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Rounded craft hovering then slowly moving,then disappears in 30 or so seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out for a ufo as hertford is a uk hot spot and i have had a number of sightings, i managed to video this one and it does seem to change colour at the end from white to blue, it came from the west and flew almost over my house heading east, it made no noise, i have seen one close up and they are about 20 foot in diameter, this is a different one from the other posting on here but it could be the same ufo returning a few nights later.
content.summary: Ufo white orb

content.detailedDescription: I was on the look out for ufo,s as i have had a number of sightings here in hertford, it is a ufo hot spot, i have stanstead airport a few miles away and planes are passing over and they put their head lights on for landing but at a distance they look like one light but as they get nearer you can see the twin head lights and the red and green lights, these ufo,s look like a plane with its head lights on at a distance but i watch them coming towards me and you can see it is an orb covered in a white light travelling slow at about 80 mph and i managed to film this one with a new camcorder i have just bought and it was not set up right and i could not see the orb on the viewing screen, so i am just pointing the camera in the direction of this ufo hoping to catch it, the ufo is flying in a straight line the wobble is me moving the camera around not the ufo flying funny.
content.summary: White orb shape

content.detailedDescription: In the afternoon of may 25th, i observed a nearly stationary, black spherical object from my home balcony. the balcony faces south towards downtown chicago, which is only about 1 mile away. the object appeared to be over the south loop area or just to the west of highway 90. i observed the object for about 10 minutes before it appeared to fade away without moving. i have included a video i shot from my iphone as the object can be referenced just to the west of the willis tower. with my iphone i could zoom into the video and observe the object spinning/pulsing.
content.summary: Rounds, sphere like object that hovered s/sw of downtown chicago

content.detailedDescription: Sat in garden looking at the stars  when i noticed 3 bright lights brighger than saturn they travelled in a staighty line staying perfect in formation and then faded out when they were directly above these were similar to satalites i have seen or the iss but these were 3 seperat lights forming a triangle sape as in three dots of light came form the south wewst heading north east it was unusual to see lights like this the front light faded out before the rear 2 who faded at the same tim and place as the first showing that they were equally spaced
content.summary: Three lights in ske formed in a triangle shap travelled from horizon to straight over head then faded out ( like satalites and the iss dose ) very bright at its peak

content.detailedDescription: There was no eletricity so i was standing on the terrace. i was walking and then i saw a big triangle shaped object, quite big with two white orbs on the front and a red orb as it's tail. the red orb was moving near and far from white orbs. the white orbs maintained a proper distance between each other. the body of the craft was not visible because of night time or it may not have a body. i thought it to be an aeroplane at low altitude but it was not. it was moving very slowly and turned once and stood still for almost half minute and then gone slowly. a very low humming noise was there. i was very excited to see those orbs. although it didn't went very far away but the lights slowly got dimmer and it was gone.
content.summary: Rotated and then stood still for half minute, very slow and then gone

content.detailedDescription: This is not the first time we have seen this ship, we live high up in the hills and the sky is full of flying objects, virtual highway in the skies. i was published on your site back in 2010 or 2011. this was witnessed by my son and his wife and myself around midnight. we do have an airport within in 40 miles but nothing coming in at this time. please take what we have as the truth we are not alone.
content.summary: At first looked like a bright planet then turned into a triangle. was totally lit when above us with white lights

content.detailedDescription: Watching an episode of unsealed alien files - mass sightings and d died i should reach out to you and report what my son and i saw....I'm in nashville, tennessee. the belle meade percy warner park to be specific... i'm 63 and take care of my dad stage 4 lung and brain cancer....Born and raised here.  retired from car business..... aprox 2 years ago ( need to check date ) my son in his early 30's and after eating at a nearby restaurant were riding together on hwy 100 going towards town.  we both watch ancient aliens and similar shows and frequently joke with each other about seeing a ufo. anything from plane lights to city lights, just a silly running joke between father and son. while driving and seeing lights from the field of a school shining thru the tree tops i said look ufo, ha ha....A couple of minutes later as we approached the intersection of old hickory blvd and hwy 100 ( percy warne park is no to my right) i saw lights and said look it's another ufo, but this time we both got a very clear look at a hovering triangle shaped craft with lights on all 3 corners and kinda looked florence on the sides...It slowly began to move angled where we could clearly see the bottom as it wen forward and myself still driving the park hills and trees, we lost it....Here is the thing on the other side of the hill is the steeplechase and harpeth hills golf course...It was not quite dark and a lot of rush hour traffic headed home.....My son grabbed his phone to take a picture but the flash went off and reflected into the glass so no picture. i was doing about 45 mph in the center lane and couldn't stop or pull over because of traffic.   i never heard a report or anything about it anywhere. i went into a ufo sightings website and reported what we saw hoping to fix no someone else that witnessed it....Didn't happen. he and i speak of it frequently just to keep the memory fresh.....We both believe we just didn't expect to see ....As to the size. very large. filled a chunk of the sky, could have been anywhere from 1/4 mile up to a mile away....Hard to say but my guess possibly several football fields in size.....Thanks watching the show and read about you figured you were the one if anybody would be interested....Oh yea this area is the nicest part of nashville, lot of traffic, not quite dark, clearly visible....Somebody else had to see this other than myself and my son....At last he was with me so i have a witness....Thanks for your time..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Please see comment belo for details

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 62 year old white male. i was traveling with my son on ranch road 12 out of wimberly texas heading towards i-35 at approximately 2 pm. it was a clear day with a few clouds. out the front window i saw a bright 
 silver saucer shaped object speeding across my line of sight. the bottom & top of the object was cloud like or hazed. it was like the bottom & top were camoflaged  i saw it for about 5 seconds it was traveling at a good clip but dismissed it since the sun was reflecting off it i assumed it was just a strange weather event. then my son said to me, "did you see that?" so i looked out the right hand side of the car (i was the passenger) looking west in the direction which it was headed and saw nothing it had simply disappeared! i looked for it for 5 minutes to no avail.
content.summary: Silver like a cigar or saucer object with its top & bottom in a haze

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday may 30, 2017
around 10:30pm

at about the city of temple city or arcadia california or maybe slightly more towards the north, a dim light above the clouds was seen by my children and me.
this evening we had a overcast night that started around 6pm or so, curiously i began seeing planes at high altitudes during the afternoon passing by and leaving chem trails on our nice clear day, but not sure if that's what created the current cloudy evening.
from my point of view standing south of the 10fwy and about san gabriel blvd. i saw the dim light above the overcast sky, looking north slightly east (or also) pointing north at around 2 o'clock. 
like i said we had a overcast night and the light was above the clouds but looked more like a big light (something like a round shape) at my distance could probably say it looked like aircraft that was hovering for long time, but not to the effect of shopper, just a brighter part of the sky that looked very odd. as i invited my kids to view the (what i called a ufo experience) bright part of the sky, they said it looked weird as well.
the brighter part of the sky was maybe lit around (by my guess) 50-75ft and obviously created and effect of a dimmer glow around it extending it to maybe around 100ft in diameter. the lit part of the sky was stationery and also seemed to have a sort of trail going east to west. i saw this for a good few minutes before i called my kids to come out and see it, after a a short while we decided to go back in.
according to the weather reports:
67.2℉
overcast 1500ft
wind 1mph
visibility 9 miles
dew point 57℉
humidity 81%
moon=waxing crescent
content.summary: About above the city of temple city, arcadia or north, bright light above clouds, stationary at around 10:30pm

content.detailedDescription: We captured what appears to be a fast moving object in a hdr photo while in joshua tree national park.  we did not see or hear anything noticeable until we reviewed the photo.
content.summary: We captured what appears to be a fast moving object in a hdr photo.

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from work i noticed a light in the sky it was too late in the morning for there to be any stars still out about 8 am. it started small as i was driving i noticed that it wasn't moving and was getting bigger so i pulled over and took a picture. i had to leave but kept watching and it started getting smaller until it finally vanished about 15 minutes later
content.summary: Looking like a star that got bigger and then smaller until vanished

content.detailedDescription: Driving alone down highway 1082 around 8:20 pm on 5 / 25 / 17, approaching pat o'brien road intersection. two bright amber colored "dots", one next to other ( estimated 20 - 30 feet between "dots" )in steady hover--dangerously near high voltage power line structure, caught my attention. i actually brought my car to a complete stop on the highway to get a better look.  my first thought was possibly they were private owned drones--piloted by carelessly stupid people. i took a look around ground area, looking for drone pilots; saw nobody around. had another brief look at the amber dots: steady amber glow; no flashing colored lights.  both seemed,( using nearby power line structure to estimate size ), to be size comparable to a large motorcycle or sub compact car. if these objects were drones--they were expensive ones--the kind that had to make some sound. rolled window down and heard nothing. approaching traffic caused me to move on. i tried later to rationally speculate what i saw--and i can not say for sure what i saw.
content.summary: Simply two spherical bright amber "dots", one next to other, both about size of small compact car. both hovering near high voltage power line structure.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard talking on my phone with my best friend, i was looking up at the moon it was in a crescent shape and i was very relaxed, all of a sudden i looked away and look back and there was a very large bright white light in the sky it looked like a star i thought it was strange because it wasn't there when i blinked my eyes before, i still felt calm and continued to watch it amazed by how bright it was. i then kept staring at it and told my friend to hold on all of a sudden it went straight up and got smaller and smaller and smaller as it went up and then completely disappeared as it crested the bottom of the moon as far as i could see it i have seen ufos my whole life and i've had strange things show up on the back of my head in the back of my ears they are like one-inch incisions so my mother has also been visited her whole life i really didn't discuss this with many people but what i saw tonight is something i have never seen before. i have seen usos or ufos come out of the ocean and into the ocean in sarasota florida on turtle beach 20 years ago but still never talk to people about it what i saw tonight i have never seen it is absolutely undeniable
content.summary: I was sitting in my backyard looking up at the moon i saw a very bright star come out of nowhere just appear, then i watched it for a second and it went straight up and got smaller and smaller and smaller and disappeared right before it past the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard talking on my phone with my best friend, i was looking up at the moon it was in a crescent shape and i was very relaxed, all of a sudden i looked away and look back and there was a very large bright white light in the sky it looked like a star i thought it was strange because it wasn't there when i blinked my eyes before, i still felt calm and continued to watch it amazed by how bright it was. i then kept staring at it and told my friend to hold on all of a sudden it went straight up and got smaller and smaller and smaller as it went up and then completely disappeared as it crested the bottom of the moon as far as i could see it i have seen ufos my whole life and i've had strange things show up on the back of my head in the back of my ears they are like one-inch incisions so my mother has also been visited her whole life i really didn't discuss this with many people but what i saw tonight is something i have never seen before. i have seen usos or ufos come out of the ocean and into the ocean in sarasota florida on turtle beach 20 years ago but still never talk to people about it what i saw tonight i have never seen it is absolutely undeniable
content.summary: I was sitting in my backyard looking up at the moon i saw a very bright star come out of nowhere just appear, then i watched it for a second and it went straight up and got smaller and smaller and smaller and disappeared right before it past the moon

content.detailedDescription: My wife, son and i went to eat dinner in bartlesville, ok and when we left the restaurant the sky was a bright orange.  a storm just passed through.  my wife and son both took pictures of the sunset.  about a week later my son (11) was going through his pictures at lunch and noticed the object in the sky.  i asked my wife about her pictures and the object is in her picture also.
content.summary: Found pictures on phone after taking pictures of sunset. 2 different phones

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend walking back to our houses after hanging out, it was at night (around 11 pm) and there were some fireworks going on at the time so we looked up to see them. but when i looked up i saw lots of distanced lights flashing (and i'm 100% sure it wasn't the fireworks since there was no explosions in that particular area of sky). at first i didn't think much of it (you know, could be planes and stars just shinning as usual) but the amount of flasheds in that particular area didn't feel normal. after a while i saw them moving slowly like flocks of birds. i counted around 10-15 (maybe more) "star-like" objects flashing very quickly - like christmas lights-, moving freely. i wasn't sure how to feel because i'm very skeptic about these kinds of deals because the usual reports are just some "dude" in the middle of the desert with a crappy camera and cut-off footage. but this time... i don't know. when my friend (who witnessed the event) went home the lights were still there, moving and blinking like no tomorrow, i believe at some point the conglomerate of lights made a cross (probably «just a coincidence but i'm just trying to be as descriptive as i can) but it just shows how much they were moving. after i took footage of the event i walked back home always looking to the sky to see what more could happen. the "lights" started to move further and further away until they dissipated into the darkness of the night sky. after i came home and showed my father the footage he was as skeptic as me and told me to send it to some site's like these. i completely forgot that i had the footage on my computer saved until now. this is all i can remember and describe.

hope there's some explanation to this. 


p.S the photos attached were taken one after the other and in one of the videos my friend says "are we high or something? (just to clear things up).

hope there's some explanation to this.
content.summary: Cluster of lights in the air (almost like stars)

content.detailedDescription:
May 29, 2017. approximately 3:00am

my friends and i were outside engaging in late night conversation when my attention was diverted to the magnificence of the night sky. i panned the stars, occasionally seeing a shooting star. i noticed a very faint and dim satellite crossing over head and it kept my attention for some time until i noticed a brighter, faster moving object. i watched the two objects cross paths, and i could tell that the brighter object was at a lower altitude than the dim satellite. i kept my attention on the bright object. my friend asked me what i was looking at, so i told him i was mesmerized by a satellite. he then looked up and noticed the bright object. we were both watching the object when it all of the sudden vanished into space. no change of speed or direction. it just simply dimmed out into the nothingness of space. this occurrence affected us both psychologically because me and this friend have witnessed two other objects of the exact same color and brightness do the exact same thing in the exact same context. i noticed the object first, my friend saw it for a few brief seconds, and then poof, gone.
content.summary: Bright light crosses path with satellite, is observed for a few minutes, fades into darkness of space

content.detailedDescription: While driving with a passenger my vehicle, at around 2245hrs travelling westbound, i noticed 2 orange lights that stood out to me high in the sky and they were moving closer together.  i did not observe any flashing strobes or red/white lights indicating a plane.  my passenger observed this as well.  i pulled over the vehicle so we could safely watch from a stationary position. the lights were to the sw from our position.  one of the lights seemed to be moving closer to the other and then they simply vanished without a trace.  we waited for 5 more minutes and when they did not reappear we left and carried on our way.  the lights were the size of the stars but they were orange and they were moving towards each other.  they did not appear to be planes or planets due to the nature of their colour an movement.
content.summary: 2 orange lights high in the sky size of stars moving closer together and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping at my apartment on the edge of bucktown and wicker park, close to the western cta station. it was a little after 1 o'clock at night on the evening of memorial day, tuesday, may 30th, 2017. 

i was having difficulty sleeping that night because i had taken an extended nap after watching an episode of keeping up with the kardashians from the night before. it was the one in which kortney decides to not accompany kim to new york fashion week for kanye's fashion show at the last minute, causing the rest of the family to confront kourtney on the account of her chronic indecisiveness. since is has started getting warmer in chicago, i have noticed that i am falling asleep in the early evenings more and more, which has been negatively affecting my regular sleeping patterns. i hope that this does not become a habit.

sometime after 1, i began to hear a loud noise coming from outside. there was a very loud, and very consistent banging that happened just outside my apartment for several minutes. it sounded like how i would picture gun shouts sounding underwater, but louder. i looked up from my bed to check outside one time and saw a bright flash of white light. after doing some research i believe this to be the humanoid man bat that has increased in sightings in chicago recently.
content.summary: Possible chicago man bat sighting

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on i-5 to grants pass, or from hugo, or. taking pictures of blue sky because it had been raining continuously. caught this ufo on film. this is the last picture in a series of 4 taken 30 seconds apart.
content.summary: Taking pictures on way to grants pass and captured ufo on film.

content.detailedDescription: I know this was a long time ago but before my time is gone i need to share this with someone besides my wife.. i am not certain on the month only it was cold. when i was 18 i just pulled into my driveway after coming home from work around 1 am. as i got out of car i heard a deep rumbling sound almost a hum. looked around then up and saw a huge round object slowly moving over a big willow tree in neighbor's yard. it was moving so slow my first thought was maybe a blimp for i lived fairly close to parks college which had a small airport for local planes. it was not. it slowly flew or hovered like directly over me only say 50 to 100 feet above. i actually walked exactly under this as it moved toward the west and route 3. seemed like i walked under this for over 20 minutes but there is only 3 yards of smaller size between my house and the highway. in detail i remember it seemed to have a strange outline. even though it was a sphere it seemed to have rectangular beams connecting all around it as much as i could see of it. like that was a structure holding it together. as it approached the highway there was a gas station, closed but an all night truck stop called royal treat. so as we ( object and i ) approached the back of the gas station it changed direction towards the north parallel along route 3  and got a bit higher.Then i stopped to see this all in an extreme short time make a swishing sound as it just speed away in a curving direction then gone in a blink. i ran back to my house and called lambert airport outside of st. louis and asked to speak to someone to report something in the sky. i was connected to a female. i remember asking if something was spotted on radar in my area about 10 minutes ago. she did not laugh but only said no. then i called my soon to be wife. her father answered but i did not tell him. told my fiance remembering i did not want to hang up or be alone that night. never told anyone else. but about 25 years ago we were watching tv when a special on ufo's came on and sure enough it showed this exact object during that time and place with a policeman reporting from the higher levy close to dupo illinois. several police from cahokia and dupo did see this and reported it. i wish i would had reported it to them but was afraid to for obvious reasons. i do not remember how there was a recording of this but it showed this object exactly doing as i explained in the exact location. my wife and i watched this. she said omg ben this is what you described to me a long time ago. she never said but i saw in her eyes that evening she finally did believe it. yes it was that object but we just let it go for we were both managers for major stores and did not need the talk of a small town. i have tried so hard to find the origin of that video but to no avail. i just found your site today by accident. i wish so much i had known of you way long ago. this is only making me shake with chills again not releasing this burden i have felt for so so long. i am now 62. but believe me i have wished for so long for this to happen again so i could hopefully have a witness with me. i have only seen a couple strange things since in the distance but not looking for it. i have told my wife if only i could be hypnotized to remember more detail or see it again mentally. i know in my heart this happened. i will not believe this was man made. if so governments sure are good at hiding technology. last thing..I really don't care about being anonymous on this for i am retired without a fear of damage to my credibility. it was so long ago i do not figure anyone cares now. if i was younger be certain my involvement would be great for i believe people have the right to know even if they are skeptics.
content.summary: Perfectly round, dark orange glow,slowly moving tree tops above my head deep rumbling

content.detailedDescription: Was returning home from work and passing a radio station and tower on the east edge of town. was going over a bridge over the rail road tracks and sighted a single light a few hundred feet above my car. first i thought it was beacon light on transmitter tower and realized it was solid orange and not the tower light. as i got to the top of the bridge i looked back forward and saw 3 more. orange brightly glowing spheres. weather was extremely foggy and could only see a few hundred feet in any direction. this is a 2 lane road i was on and couldn't just stop. i slowed to about 15 miles and hour and was leaning forward to look up at them thru the windshield. i had already past the first. the other 3 were in view. lasted 20 seconds at most. but they were 2-3 ft round spheres glowing a bright but defined and non-flickering orange light. at first i wanted to believe they were chinese lanterns. but they were smooth round, and orange no flickering. they were moving east-south east fairly slowly. it was a calm foggy light. once i got home ,approx 2 minutes later, i decided to go look for them again. i drove around the area for 10-15 minutes stopping and looking all the way to the interstate and did not see them again.
content.summary: 4 orange glowing, non flickering spheres, very crisp and clear.
